amendment.description: To repeal a requirement for an officer to retire upon termination of service as Superintendent of the Air Force Academy.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3254 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3254 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Allard. (consideration: CR 6/18/2004 S6971-6980; text: CR 6/18/2004 S6976) To repeal a requirement for an officer to retire upon termination of service as Superintendent of the Air Force Academy.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3254 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3254 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Allard.
